title: "11_Summarize additional ordinal models"
author: "Julia Rohrer"
date: "`r Sys.Date()`"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```


```{r}
library(brms)

# Ordinal basic model
ordinal_basic <- readRDS("Models/ordinal_brms")

# Free thresholds across gender
ordinal_gender <- readRDS("Models/ordinal_brms_free_gender")


# Free thresholds across years
ordinal_year <- readRDS("Models/ordinal_brms_free_year")

# Basic model with same thresholds for everyone
summary(ordinal_basic)

# Allow thresholds to vary by gender
summary(ordinal_gender)


# Allow thresholds to vary by year
summary(ordinal_year)


```
